data.text: @d1Vinman I too have not given up trying to protect myself. I am triple vaccinated but the possibility of surviving Covid only to suffer long Covid issues for the rest of my life gives me great pause.
@TrueBluPatriot My friends had it months ago and say they still can't taste anything.
@d1Vinman My daughter who got covid from an Amazon delivery box while quarantined had no taste or smell, said tongue felt hairy. She lost 20 lbs (she was a size 4) in less than 2 weeks.
